stories.title: Portfolio Manager - View Active Ventures Dashboard
stories.story: As a Portfolio Manager, I want to view a comprehensive dashboard of all active ventures approaching exit stage, so that I can monitor progress and prioritize my exit coordination efforts.
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN I am logged in as a Portfolio Manager
WHEN I navigate to the Stage 40 dashboard
THEN I see a list of all ventures with exit status indicators
AND each venture shows: name, current stage, exit timeline, key metrics
AND I can filter ventures by exit type, timeline, or status
AND the dashboard refreshes automatically every 5 minutes

stories.title: Portfolio Manager - Initiate Exit Process
stories.story: As a Portfolio Manager, I want to initiate the exit process for a venture, so that all stakeholders are notified and the exit workflow begins systematically.
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN I have a venture ready for exit
WHEN I click "Initiate Exit" from the venture detail view
THEN I see an exit configuration form with exit type selection
AND I can set target timeline and assign exit coordinator
AND clicking "Start Exit Process" creates workflow and notifies stakeholders
AND the venture status updates to "Exit in Progress"

stories.title: Exit Coordinator - Manage Exit Workflow
stories.story: As an Exit Coordinator, I want to track and update exit workflow progress, so that all stakeholders stay informed and no critical steps are missed.
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN I am assigned to coordinate a venture exit
WHEN I access the exit workflow dashboard
THEN I see all workflow steps with completion status
AND I can update step status and add notes to each step
AND status updates automatically notify relevant stakeholders

stories.title: Venture Team Lead - Transition Team Activities
stories.story: As a Venture Team Lead, I want to coordinate my team's transition from active development to exit preparation, so that team members understand their new roles.
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN my venture has entered exit process
WHEN I access the team transition dashboard
THEN I see all team members with their exit-phase assignments
AND I can schedule transition meetings and track handover documentation

stories.title: Executive Stakeholder - Monitor Portfolio Performance
stories.story: As an Executive Stakeholder, I want to view portfolio-level exit analytics and performance metrics, so that I can assess venture exit strategy effectiveness.
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN I need to review portfolio exit performance
WHEN I access the executive analytics dashboard
THEN I see portfolio-wide exit success rates and ROI metrics
AND I can filter by time period and export performance reports

stories.title: Exit Coordinator - Regulatory Compliance Tracking
stories.story: As an Exit Coordinator, I want to track regulatory compliance requirements for different exit types, so that all legal obligations are met.
acceptance_criteria: GIVEN I am coordinating an exit with regulatory requirements
WHEN I access the compliance tracking module
THEN I see all required compliance items for the exit type
AND I can update completion status and upload compliance documents
